---
title: "Le module networkx"
subtitle: "Boîte à outil pour les graphes"
description: "Utilisation du module networkx pour la création et l'analyse de graphes"
date: "2023-03-30"
categories: [Python, NSI, Programmation]
image: "logo_networkx.png"
---

# Le module networkx

::: {.cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import algorithmx
canvas = algorithmx.jupyter_canvas(buttons=True)

canvas.nodes(range(1, 8)).add()
canvas.edges([(i, i+1) for i in range(1, 7)]
           + [(1, 3), (2, 4), (2, 7)]).add()

for i in range(1, 8):
    canvas.pause(0.5)
    canvas.node(i).color('green').highlight().size('1.25x')

    if i < 8:
        canvas.pause(0.5)
        canvas.edge((i, i+1)).traverse('green')

canvas
```
